Class SocialClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • SocialClient

  • public class SocialClient
extends java.lang.Object
    SocialClient is a toy application for simulating the connections between profiles in an asymmetric (i.e., following) social network. It is a client of the Set and Profile classes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SocialClient() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void create()
      Guides the user through creating a new profile in the system.
      static void edit()
      Guides the user through editing a profile.
      static void follow()
      Guides the user through adding one "following" connection (making one profile follow another).
      static void list()
      Lists the profiles in the system for the user to choose between.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Runs the toy social media application.
      static ProfileInterface pick()
      Guides the user through picking a profile from the list.
      static ProfileInterface pick(java.lang.String theLine)
      Guides the user through picking a profile from the list.
      static void recommend()
      Prompts for a profile, then recommends another profile for the chosen profile to follow.
      static void show()
      Shows the details of one profile.
      static void unfollow()
      Guides the user through removing one "following" connection (making one profile unfollow another).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Runs the toy social media application. Attempts to restore data from previous runs, if possible.

      • list

        public static void list()
        Lists the profiles in the system for the user to choose between.

        public static void create()
        Guides the user through creating a new profile in the system.

      • show

        public static void show()
        Shows the details of one profile.

      • pick

        public static ProfileInterface pick()
        Guides the user through picking a profile from the list.
        Returns:
        the profile chosen by the user

      • pick

        public static ProfileInterface pick(java.lang.String theLine)
        Guides the user through picking a profile from the list.
        Parameters:
        theLine - The string to display to the user as a prompt
        Returns:
        the profile chosen by the user

      • edit

        public static void edit()
        Guides the user through editing a profile.

      • follow

        public static void follow()
        Guides the user through adding one "following" connection (making one profile follow another).

      • unfollow

        public static void unfollow()
        Guides the user through removing one "following" connection (making one profile unfollow another).

      • recommend

        public static void recommend()
        Prompts for a profile, then recommends another profile for the chosen profile to follow.
